base_description: Rectangular white cabinet with four doors.
part_description: The cabinet has four doors, arranged in two rows of two. Each door is rectangular, with handles positioned horizontally near the edge.
internal_interaction_description: The doors are hinged and open outward, allowing access to the internal compartments. Each door can be opened independently, providing flexible access to different sections of the cabinet.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet is designed to be placed against a wall, providing storage space. It interacts with users through the opening and closing of doors, and can hold various items inside.
